features.featureTitle: Fix the Awards & Recognition section on the About page (frontend/src/pages/About.tsx) so that all 4 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg) render visibly and correctly. Ensure each tag has a valid src path starting with '/assets/generated/', correct alt text, an explicit container size with object-fit: cover, and no CSS rules that hide or zero-size the images. Verify the static asset files exist at frontend/public/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg.

Fix the Awards & Recognition sub-section on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) so that all 4 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg) render visibly and correctly. Ensure each tag has a valid src path starting with '/assets/generated/', correct alt text, an explicit container size with object-fit: cover, and no CSS rules that hide or zero-size the images.
